problem_text:
Let G be a finitely generated pro-p-group not involving the wreath product Cp ≀Zp as a closed section (where Cp is a cyclic group of order p and Zp is the group of p-adic integers). Does it follow that G is p-adic analytic?
A. Shalev
answer: No, it does not (A. Jaikin-Zapirain, B. Klopsch, J. London Math. Soc. (2), 76, no. 2 (2007), 365–383).
